src:
Prabowo Akui Butuh Masukkan Seluruh Menteri
07 Nov 2019, 21:44 by Rayinda Muhammad Ichwan


Prabowo Akui Butuh Masukkan Seluruh Menteri

KBRN, Jakarta: Menteri Pertahanan Prabowo Subianto memastikan akan berkoordinasi dengan seluruh menteri Kabinet Indonesia Maju terkait rencana kerja kementeriannya.
Prabowo mengatakan, dirinya membutuhkan masukan dari seluruh jajaran kabinet agar kinerja kementeriannya dapat maksimal di pemerintahan.
”Semua nanti satu-satu (menteri) saya mintakan masukan,” kata Prabowo, Jakarta, Kamis (7/10/2019).
Adapun pada pekan ini, ia menemui Menko Kemaritiman Luhut B Pandjaitan sebagai bentuk pertemuan khususnya bersama para menteri.
"Saya sering keliling ke semua menteri. Saya meminta saran dan pemikiran-pemikiran beliau," tandas mantan partner Sandiaga Uno ini di pilpres 2019.
text:
Prabowo Admits Need to Enter the Entire Minister
Nov 7 2019, 21:44 by Rayinda Muhammad Ichwan


Prabowo Admits Need to Enter the Entire Minister

KBRN, Jakarta: Defense Minister Prabowo Subianto confirmed that he would coordinate with all the ministers of the Advanced Indonesian Cabinet regarding his ministry's work plan.
Prabowo said he needed input from all levels of the cabinet so that his ministry's performance could be maximized in the government.
"All I will ask for input one by one (minister)," said Prabowo, Jakarta, Thursday (10/07/2019).
As for this week, he met with the Coordinating Minister for Maritime Affairs Luhut B Pandjaitan as a form of meeting especially with the ministers.
"I often go around all ministers. I ask for his suggestions and thoughts," said the former Sandiaga Uno partner in the 2019 presidential election.
